combine-collections-transformer.doc:name: Combine Collections
combine-collections-transformer.doc:description: This is necessary because of an underlying Mule mechanic. This operation does not flatten arrays of arrays, but it does turn Mule collections of objects - like those created after a split-collect operation - into a single Mule message. The payload remains unaffected, but it allows operations on the payload to continue.
